section.27: Chapters on Righteousness And Maintaining Good Relations With Relatives

hadiths.text: Hudhaifah narrated that the Messenger of Allah said:“Do not be a people without a will of your own, saying: 'If people treat us well, we will treat them well; and if they do wrong, we will do wrong,' but accustom yourselves to do good if people do good, and do not behave unjustly if they do evil.”
